question: How many inhabitants approximately live in the urban area of Jihlava, Czech Republic as of the most recent records?
asked_question_translated: Hvor mange indbyggere bor der cirka i byområdet Jihlava, Tjekkiet, ifølge de seneste opgørelser?
answer: Byområdet Jihlava i Tjekkiet har cirka 50.000 indbyggere ifølge de seneste opgørelser.
answer_translated_eng: The urban area of Jihlava in the Czech Republic has approximately 50,000 inhabitants according to the latest figures.
